data.comment: The match has started at Stadion.
Ball safe as Sirius is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Malmo.
Goal! A Isaac Thelin header gives Malmo a 1-0 lead in Malmo.
Soren Rieks with an assist there.
In the minute 4, Can Malmo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sirius's half?
Victor Wolf signals a Malmo throw-in in Sirius's half.
Important block from the Sirius defence as Anders Christiansen fires in a strike for Malmo.
In the minute 6, Malmo to take a throw-in in Sirius territory.
Free kick Malmo.
Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
In the minute 8, It's now 2-0 in Malmo as Anders Christiansen scores for Malmo.
Great play from Ola Toivonen to set up the goal.
Free kick for Malmo in the half of Sirius.
In the minute 11, Anders Christiansen for Malmo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Sirius have a goal kick.
Malmo's Isaac Thelin gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sirius defender.
In the minute 12, Malmo pushes forward through Anders Christiansen, whose finish on goal is saved.
Soren Rieks for Malmo drives towards goal at Stadion. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Victor Wolf awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 14, In Malmo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal! Ola Toivonen extends Malmo lead to 3-0 with a header.
That's a fine assist from Jo Inge Berget.
In the minute 16, Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Sirius in the half of Malmo.
In the minute 20, Malmo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Malmo have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
In the minute 24, Sirius's Yukiya Sugita breaks free at Stadion. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Malmo at Stadion.
In Malmo Sirius drive forward through Yukiya Sugita. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to Sirius.
Throw-in Malmo.
Victor Wolf signals a Sirius throw-in in Malmo's half.
In the minute 27, Ball goes out of play for a Sirius goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Malmo.
Malmo have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
In the minute 30, Soren Rieks (Malmo) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Victor Wolf awards Sirius a goal kick.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Malmo in their own half.
Throw-in for Sirius close to the penalty box.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Sirius close to the penalty box.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Sirius.
Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Malmo in their own half.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Malmo in their own half.
Laorent Shabani is booked for the away team.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Malmo in their own half.
Corner awarded to Malmo.
Free kick for Malmo in the half of Sirius.
In the minute 43, Ola Toivonen (Malmo) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Sirius at Stadion.
Malmo push forward at Stadion and Isaac Thelin gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Sirius defence.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Sirius at Stadion.
Sirius awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Victor Wolf awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Victor Wolf has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Malmo's Ola Toivonen misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Sirius goal kick.
Henrik Rydstrom is making the team's first substitution at Stadion with Simon Gefvert replacing Laorent Shabani.
Malmo have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
In the minute 47, Malmo's Anders Christiansen gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Sirius have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Sirius.
In the minute 48, Sirius are coming forward and Karl Larson gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Victor Wolf awards Malmo a goal kick.
Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Malmo.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Sirius in the half of Malmo.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Sirius in their own half.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
Free kick Malmo.
Malmo have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
In the minute 56, It's a goal kick for the away team in Malmo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Malmo.
In the minute 58, Malmo have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
Free kick for Malmo in their own half.
Elias Andersson (Sirius) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 60, Throw-in Malmo.
Malmo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Malmo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sirius's half?
In the minute 63, Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Jo Inge Berget is booked for the home team and will be suspended from the next match.
In Malmo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 65, Stefano Vecchia of Sirius smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In Malmo, Elias Andersson of Sirius is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Karl Larson of Sirius gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 65, Malmo have a goal kick.
Sirius drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In Malmo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 69, Erdal Rakip (Malmo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ball safe as Sirius is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Malmo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, Jon Dahl Tomasson (Malmo) is making a first substitution, with Arnor Traustason replacing Soren Rieks.
Malmo are whistled for offside.
Malmo's Eric Larsson gets in a shot on goal at Stadion. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 74, Malmo have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
Goal! Malmo extend their lead to 4-0 through Eric Larsson.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Isaac Thelin.
In the minute 77, The away team replace Mohammed Saeid with Andre Osterholm.
Isak Braholm is replacing Johan Karlsson for Sirius at Stadion.
Isaac Thelin is back on his feet again.
In the minute 78, Free kick in a good position for Malmo!
Ola Toivonen (Malmo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick Malmo.
In the minute 80, Adi Nalic is on a sub for Ola Toivonen for Malmo.
The home team have replaced Anders Christiansen with Oscar Lewicki. This is the third substitution made today by Jon Dahl Tomasson.
Noel Hansson is replacing Jamie Roche for Sirius at Stadion.
In the minute 82, Henrik Rydstrom (Sirius) is making a fifth substitution, with Erik Langwagen replacing Stefano Vecchia.
Free kick for Sirius in the half of Malmo.
Malmo are pushing forward but Erdal Rakip's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 86, It's a goal kick for the away team in Malmo.
The home team have replaced Jonas Knudsen with Behrang Safari. This is the fourth substitution made today by Jon Dahl Tomasson.
Amin Sarr is replacing Isaac Thelin for the home team.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Malmo at Stadion.
Sirius needs to be cautious. Malmo have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for Sirius at Stadion.
In the minute 89, Malmo are coming forward and Arnor Traustason gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Victor Wolf awards Sirius a goal kick.
Sirius to take a throw-in in Malmo territory.
Malmo awarded a free kick in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Sirius will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Malmo.
Victor Wolf signals a Malmo throw-in in Sirius's half.
Victor Wolf blows to end the match. The final score is 4-0.
